abstract: The complaint asks the court to disgorge David Sokol’s trading profits in Lubrizol and to award damages because of the damage done to Berkshire Hathaway’s goodwill.
snippet: The complaint asks the court to disgorge David Sokol’s trading profits in Lubrizol and to award damages because of the damage done to Berkshire Hathaway’s goodwill.
lead_paragraph: A shareholder of Berkshire Hathaway has sued Warren E. Buffett and his former top lieutenant, David L. Sokol, accusing the two of misconduct related to Mr. Sokol’s stock trading.

headline.main: Buffett and Sokol Sued Over Trading in Lubrizol Shares
